Brings back memories. QWTF/TF1 is harder to setup with bots and friends. TFC fills that gap of having smoother, newer controls but keeping closer to the original 2.x TF.

Lot of support is around for the game, and yes while multiplayer in general is dead compared to TF2, I chose this game for its bot capabilities and playing with friends like old school LAN times.
kinda janky because goldsrc but a good alternative to the (free) fortress forever because this actually has players, it's worth the $1 you can buy it for in sales

Kept crashing. I start it up and attempt to maximize the window. It crashes. Okay. I launch it again and hover over the things on the start screen. Golly jeepers, those are loud. I turn down my computer's volume, and it crashes. Okay. I launch it again and attempt to lower the in-game volume with the options. I click on options, and it crashes. Okay, not changing the settings then. I launch it again and attempt to just play the game. The server select screen opens and then it crashes. I tried to uninstall then reinstall the game, and it still crashes. Please help.

Having played this game for a bit and being quite old it's still a very fun game and it's nice to see what team fortress was like back then the game never lags there is no trouble with trying to get it to work properly It can be run with any PC these days and I'm surprised people still play it to this day  and I love playing every class and I love  playing this game it's worth every penny and I recommend it.

[h1]Un pezzo di storia.[/h1]
Un grande classico, peccato che essendo abituato al moderno non riesca a godermelo a pieno. Se non vedo cappelli senza senso o balli inopportuni non sono contento.
This game was way ahead of its time.

Nostalji olsun diye almak istedim fakat oyunda malesef yazılım hataları var. Saçma bir şekilde bir yerde birden fazla bomba patlıyorsa oyun kasmaya başlıyor. Bunun dışında bazı şeyler düzgün şekilde entegre edilememiş ben hayal kırıklığına uğradım windows xp de oynadığım zamanlarda böyle hatalar yoktu.Sanırım oyun eski olduğu için yeni sistemlere entegre edememişler,uğraşmak istememişler. Madem uğraşmak istemiyorsunuz niye oyunu para ile satıyorsunuz orasıda soru işareti. Oyunu geri iade etitm.

Güzel, yaz indirimlerinde %90 indirimli almıştım. Gene öyle bir indirim gelir. Zamanın en iyi oyunlarından. Girdim bir servera bozukalar ortalıkta uçuşuyor :D Serverlar hala dolu.
经典，比2还要变态
Revisit the olden days of TF.

Pretty fun time. I enjoy hopping on every now and then, and the small communities that are left are generally filled with nice people. Takes some getting used to if you came from Team Fortress 2 like I did, but it's not too bad. Be ready to have your ass handed to you, though, this game is filled with veterans, it's almost all that's left of the playerbase.

hace mucho hice una critica de mierda a este juego de mierda pero me di cuenta de que esddte juego de mierda no es tan de mierda de hecho puede ser un poco entretenido.
a ver los graficos me doy cuenta y no son tan malos, pero sigo creyendo que el half life 1 tiene mejores graficos, sigo pensando que las clases estan muy desbalanceadas el heavy y el soldier son demasiado op y ni hablar de los jugadoresw main de estas clases ademas de que hay classes que ya de plano son basicamente inutiles como el pyro y el scout. creo que en todo el juegop esas seran las ultimas clases que aprendas a dominar.las granadas son jodidamente molestas sobretodo por lo facil que es que te maten con una soolo con presionar un boton. 
entonces que es lo bueno de este juego? NO SE simplemente es entretenido para la mierda que tiene la verdad este juego tiene su magia, solo tienes que aprender a jugarlo. pero eso si si te vas a comprar este juego mejor comprate el counter strike. este juego solo es apto para tostadoras como la mia

My summary in 4 sentences:
Team Fortress Classic feels a lot more serious to me than its sequel.The game is very old and understandably no one plays it.The only 2 servers I found were servers with minigames,not actual tf (it was fun tho).I suggest not getting this game full price,as you won't get much of an experience.
the bestest

Coming from team fortress 2, an imroved game that costs $5 less than this, I am dissapointed. The game's balance is absolutely terrible and the grenade feature ruins alot of the class relationships established and near perfected in the second game. I could barely play 3 games before the grenade spam and lack of visual clarity made me force myself to quit. Would not reccomend. The sequel has a much better experience.

Yet another Half-Life mod-turned game. The graphics are very dated at this point. I am not particularly interested in these kinds of games. I prefer more story-driven games than these online competitive games. I also think Gary's Mod has more fun games to play around with than this one does. I got it as part of the Half-Life Valve bundle, but now I wish I could have just gone through and got the games that I would actually play.
Not exactly my kind of game, but seeing what this paved the way for, I can only have positive feelings about it. 9/10
